9ca26c2d-6318-4fc7-a78e-0da5c4798a32.description: This credential represents verification of a background check through The American Society of Home Inspectors. Sterling Talent Solutions (Sterling) provides the criminal background information for ASHI’s Background Verified Inspector® Program (BVI®).
9ca26c2d-6318-4fc7-a78e-0da5c4798a32.name: Background Verified Inspector

issuer.summary: issued by American Society of Home Inspectors

badge_template_activities.title: Active Membership in American Society of Home Inspectors (ASHI)

Completed background check through Sterling Talent Solutions which includes:  Social Security Number Trace; County Criminal Records; Nationwide Criminal Records; Department of Justice Sex Offender Database; Locator Select which includes over 3,500 jurisdictions.

ASHI urges consumers to contact Sterling to understand the details, limitations, and conditions of the criminal background information that Sterling provides. ASHI does not investigate an inspector’s background, and it does not evaluate an inspector’s technical qualifications to perform an inspection. ASHI, its officers, directors and employees assume no liability whatsoever to any party for the inspector and the inspection.

4b92bfbf-8b8a-499a-8219-496c41489650.description: The earner of this badge has a foundational understanding of ASHI deck standard inspection requirements. The earner is aware of the risks posed by decks, proper deck flashing protocols, and proper deck ledger attachment protocols. the earner recognizes issues involving deck stairs, handrails, and guards, issues involving deck framing and bracing, and issues involving deck posts and footings.

220f2040-f93b-4319-9099-90b701ae235c.description: The earner of this badge has a thorough understanding of how to conduct swimming pool/spa inspections in compliance with ASHI Standards. This earner knows the purpose, scope, and limitations of a pool/spa inspection, benefits and risks of pool inspections, and pool inspection protocols. This individual is aware of the components to inspect during a pool/spa inspection, criteria for evaluating inspected components, and pool/spa inspection reporting requirements.

6bdfa75f-17a2-4ba9-89f0-5ca24db0177c.description: ASHI Mentors are ASHI Certified or ASHI Retired members looking to share their knowledge and expertise with the community. This earner has been part of the ASHI community, has undergone a background check and is part of the Background Verified Inspector program. This badge recipient has met the requirements to move up to the ASHI Certified Inspector level.
